Text.Page: Naga pirates attack Intrepid, which sustains heavy damage, forcing the Vanguard Initiative to abandon ship.

These naga are trying to steal the sky cruiser!

They must have hid in some of the crates. Should have been more carefulâ€¦

We have to defend the ship.

I'll hold this position. We'll keep them from getting into the cargo hold.

Help Zolyn repel these wretches and secure Intrepid's deck.

Naga scum!

! Do you see that ugly big one? He's in command.

Think you can stop him?

Excellent!

We're not done yet, though. I'll keep clearing the deck. Have you seen that furry idiot?"I haven't."

He barked something about a manifold near the bow.

See if you can find him. His wrenches aren't as deadly as he thinks they are.

We're in trouble!

The nagas damaged the forward engines. Probably didn't know what they were doing.

Dougal needs to evacuate the ship before it crashes. Hurry, help me reach him!
Paesyn! <PCNAME>! Thank Velik you're all right.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Intrepid can't fly, sir!"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Damn! She can't be saved?

Very well. Use this horn. Order all hands to abandon the sky cruiser.

! Are you hurt? Do you still like me?

I'm glad you're alive. Seren's blessings protected you, my friend!
